channel.description: Recent content in python on Blog Indonesiadot.Com

item.title: Multi python on virtualenv using pyenv
Python Tips
item.description: module python web server python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8001 python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8002 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7943751/what-is-the-python-3-equivalent-of-python-m-simplehttpserver https://www.pcsuggest.com/best-lightweight-web-server-linux/ multiple python version on centos 6 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/20842732/libpython2-7-so-1-0-cannot-open-shared-object-file-no-such-file-or-directory https://www.2daygeek.com/install-python-3-on-centos-6/ yum install centos-release-scl -y yum --enablerepo='centos-sclo-rh' install python27-python -y echo "/opt/rh/python27/root/usr/lib64" >> /etc/ld.so.conf ldconfig /opt/rh/python27/root/usr/bin/python --version yum --enablerepo='centos-sclo-rh' install rh-python36-python /opt/rh/rh-python36/root/usr/bin/python --version

item.title: simple alert monitoring using simplemonitor
item.description: googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simple+alert+monitoringhttps://jamesoff.github.io/simplemonitor/googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=simplemonitor+dockerhttps://hub.docker.com/r/braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker/mkdir -p /docker/simplemonitor && cd /docker/simplemonitorcat > docker-compose.yml <version: ‘3.2’services: simplemonitor: restart: always image: braindoctor/simplemonitor-docker:latest container_name: simplemonitor hostname: mail-124.indonesiadot.com volumes: - ${PWD}/config:/etc/simplemonitor ports: - “8080:8080”EOFdocker-compose up -dref:https://simplemonitor.readthedocs.io/en/feature-docs/getting-started.html#writing-configuration-files
